short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the daily Bible reading in multiple languages (ES | EN | PT) every time you open a new tab in Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a spiritual sanctuary with our Chrome extension that displays the daily Bible reading in multiple languages (Spanish, English, and Portuguese). Perfect for anyone seeking to read and reflect on the Lord's word every day, this extension is entirely free of charge—you won’t pay anything to access the readings.

Rest assured, your privacy is our priority. We do not collect any data from users who install the extension, ensuring a safe and personal experience as you engage with the Scriptures.

Download now and enrich your daily life with inspiring Bible verses!
